original_text: This is what he showed me: behold, the Lord was standing beside a wall built with a plumb line, with a plumb line in his hand.
korean_text: 또 내게 보이신 것이 이러하니라 다림줄을 가지고 쌓은 담 곁에 주께서 손에 다림줄을 잡고 서셨더니

sentences.original_text: This is what he showed me:
the Lord was standing beside a wall
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 한 벽 곁에 서 계셨는데

sentences.original_text: with a plumb line in his hand.
